item.title: I tried to add a new command "tourn" but it didnt work
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

try this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("tourn")){ if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); }else{ teleportToX = 2868; teleportToY = 3591; sendMessage("your going to die you NARB!=[)."); } }
the problem was you didnt close your last bracket at the end
(and eww it was all spaced up) :P!

item.title: I tried to add a new command "tourn" but it didnt work
item.dc:creator: @blahblah112 blahblah112
item.description:
@blahblah112 wrote:

i tried to add a new command “tourn” but it didnt work, this is the command.
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“tourn”))
{
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); //made by Musicmad441
}
else
{
teleportToX = 2868;
teleportToY = 3591;
sendMessage(“your going to die you NARB!=[).”);
} then when i rebooted my server nothing happend when i typed ::tourn and there was no tab for it. so if someone could tell me how to make a tab of it it would be much appreaceated :D.lol.

Read full topic
